title: A Story - complex relationship of father and son

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Lee uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex relationship of the father and son.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Lee uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex relationship of the father and son.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
